scat pack dodge challenger american musc.title: 15' Challenger Scat Pack
scat pack dodge challenger american musc.excerpt: "We’ll see you coming from a mile away in this thing, good luck!", he wasn’t wrong. At 17 feet long and 6 feet wide, coming in at 4200 pounds and sporting a burn-your-eyes-out green paint job, this 2015 Dodge Challenger R/T Scat Pack was hard to miss.
scat pack dodge challenger american musc.author: Cody Stewart

mazda mazda6 midsize japanese kitteh.title: 15' Mazda6
mazda mazda6 midsize japanese kitteh.excerpt: The Mazda6, just another midsize sedan in the whole field of midsize sedans out there. "How do you hide a stolen cow? Hide it in a field of other cows!" This car doesn’t quite fit that adage.
mazda mazda6 midsize japanese kitteh.author: Kitteh
